entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ActivatorUtilities - matching preferred constructor depends on the constructors order #98959
  • [wasi] Support `wasi-sockets` and `wasi-http` #98957
  • Unaligned struct memory access does not work well #98952
    Future
  • Xamarin iOS application crashes after hover mouse over System.DateTime #98949
  • HttpClient getting deadlocked on InvalidateHttp2Connection #98945
    9.0.0
  • Using EnableConfigurationBindingGenerator and Uri property wrong binding when null #98943
    9.0.0
  • ICU causes crash on iOS 17.4 simulator #98941
    9.0.0
  • [linux] Segfault while invoking Roslyn's csc.dll with long command line #98936
  • BackgroundService cancellation is logged as failure if host is still starting #98935
  • Random SIGSEGVs after porting from Xamarin to net8-android #98933
  • NativeAOT Convert C# Struct to C++ Pointer Failed #98922
  • X509Chain.Build() fails to find path to root when there are cross-signed intermediate certificates (Linux only) #98921
  • Stopping blazor debug session takes too long because of Script Document Node on Solution Explorer #98932
    9.0.0
  • Number.MatchChars does not correctly support UTF-8 #98919
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M12-Beta2/b58360/b58360/b58360.dll #98918
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/ExcepFilters/mixed3/mixed3/mixed3.dll #98917
  • Test failure: GC\\Features\\KeepAlive\\keepaliveother\\keepalivetry\\keepalivetry.cmd #98916
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/eh/nested/general/throwinfinallynestedintry_ro/throwinfinallynestedintry_ro.dll #98915
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_45929/test45929/test45929.cmd #98914
  • Test failure: JIT/PGO/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst.cmd #98913
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/varargs/varargsupport/varargsupport.cmd #98911
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unittests/EHPatternTests/EHPatternTests.cmd #98909

Closed

  • Calling ASP.NET Core Blazor WebAssembly app lifecycle event in MainLayout or App - can't get a break point to stick #96032
    9.0.0
  • Blazor webassembly project Program.cs cannot be debugged #97987
  • .NET 8 - Blazor Web App - Sample solution doesn't work on Safari #98872
  • Question on SequenceReaderExtensions.TryReadMultisegment #29987
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not compare Span<T> with null #98958
    area-Meta
  • Remove RuntimeIdentifiers from Microsoft.NETCore.App.Crossgen2.sfxproj #98956
    area-Setup
  • Make sure we compact the LOH when aggressive GC is requested #98954
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix exception callstack showing incorrect line number #98953
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable the System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript tests on mt whi… #98951
    area-Build-mono
  • Move common S.P.CoreLib code under libs #98947
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix typo in extractor.cpp #98940
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • x86/funclets: Fix enumerating GC refs in methods with exception handling and localloc #98934
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add most x86 ReadyToRunHelperNode/ReadyToRunGenericHelperNode helpers #98930
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NAOT/x86] Pass hidden argument in EAX register for direct virtual stubs #98927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fix handling of x86 managed calling convention for hidden parameters #98926
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Build special win-x86 JIT with funclets for NativeAOT #98924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: Fix use of terminfo for get window size cache #98912
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Preserve all InternalsVisibleTo attributes in ILLink Trimmer #98910
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • WIP: Make FailFast a QCall #98908
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME in objectnative.cpp to QCall #97641
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set Optimize in ILLink analyzer project #98727
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Speed up native AOT testing #98939
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Only reference FreeBSD RIDs when targetting FreeBSD #98948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Build more assets in the VMR PGO builds #98950
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: Support storing Swift error register value to SwiftError struct #98586
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Mono][ppc64le] Setting r12 back to function pointer in case of global entry point #98923
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Clean up impCastClassOrIsInstToTree #98928
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize LeadingZeroCount & TrailingZeroCount. #98877
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • Delete unused enum #98944
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix ValueType.GetHashCode not calling overriden method on nested field #98754
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update RapidJSON #98573
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Update Version.Details.xml #98942
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Remove unused code #98931
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace memmove with Unsafe.CopyBlock in hydration code #98929
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: improve throughput of the RLCSE greedy heuristic #98906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement ICollection<T> on ToLookup #98895
    area-System.Linq
  • [browser][MT] dump JS threads when GC deadlock #98843
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 122.0.6261.69, windows: 122.0.6261.69 #98898
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Bump main prerelease version to 3 #98885
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unused FailFast FCALL implementation. #98907
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some errors of the struct argument parsing in LoongArch64PassStructInRegister.cs #98744
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

Updated

  • JIT: update block weight for uncond to cond flow opt #98324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interface maps' TargetMethods array should only contain generic method definitions, not instances #98790
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • XUnitLogChecker: Ensure missing stack frames are resolved on Windows using dotnet-sos #98397
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Ensuring XUnitLogChecker is included in libraries outerloop #97135
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fix SendTo with SocketAsyncEventArgs #98134
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Fix analyzer failure where incorrect SemanticModel is used #91764
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't run net4x tests with Mono on non-Windows #98767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Arm64 encoding for groups IF_SVE_CW_4A #98762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BH_3A,3B,3B_A #98764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Replace unaligned casts in Buffer.Memmove #98812
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • [NO REVIEW] correctness test for a perf improvement #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix BitArray.CopyTo #98846
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add issue template for localization data issues #98899
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threading SignalR in Blazor WBT #98343
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • chore(ilc/mach-o): add workaround or fix for problem with dead_strip #96743
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement Swift's physical lowering pass for NativeAOT #98831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_GG_3A` to `SVE_GH_3A` #98316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Update SDK to preview 1 release #98476
    area-Infrastructure
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_BH_3A` to `SVE_BH_3B_A` #98882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reapply revert of https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/97227, fix Lock's waiter duration computation #98876
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • #98551 - Regression in DI scope validation #98661
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fix failing BitCast test #98271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ILLink] Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix missing relocations in NativeAOT x86 output #98740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Optimize the overflow check for `GT_ADD` and `GT_SUB` in emitter::emitInsTernary(). #98742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [RISC-V] Don't set RM field when fcvt doesn't round #98857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO-MERGE] Don't call user callbacks on MsQuic worker thread. #98361
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Bridging generic constraints doc #97084
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: profiled SpanHelpers.Fill #98879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: temporarily enable RLCSEGreedy to see how it fares in CI #98776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove GT_STORE_DYN_BLK #98905
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Use getUnrollThreshold() to get unroll limits #98798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] R2RDump to handle System.Private.CoreLib #98849
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the assertion error for DynamicHelpers::CreateDictionaryLookupHelper(). #98741
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove ref struct pinning from locals #97997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Blank app pulls in 50K+ bytes of Itanium demangler code #2511

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement timers on Browser #2521

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Don't pass `-fwasm-exceptions` to the linker #2520

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge feb24 #2514

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet remove reference with Condition crashes #39023
  • Unable to use `[env:key=value]` directive with `dotnet watch` in 8.0.20x #39020
  • `dotnet tool install` ignores $DOTNET_ROOT and defaults to $HOME/.dotnet #39019
  • Publish AOT increases the assembly file size! #39012

Closed

  • Published ConsoleApp with AOT throws error /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.29' not found #37240
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure watch supports environment variable directives #39022
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [StaticWebAssets] Refactor and cleanup Static Web Assets infrastructure #38981
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update and rename SourceBuild.props to DotNetBuild.props #39004
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Backport #38882 to release/8.0.3xx #38960

Updated

  • Remove getX MSBuild flags from restore invocation #38956
    Servicing-consider, Area-CLI, DO NOT MERGE
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Include CodeStyle targets files even when not enforcing code style in build #38968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Select the first TFM when `run`ning a multi-targeted application #38995
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Discussion: Prototype for `dotnet tool update --all` #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unnecessary assignment ... message - incorrect #72278
  • Missing/incorrect nullability warnings with lambda expressions #72274

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue where we were trying to freeze non-C#/VB projects #72277
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle OperatorDeclaration when adding a member #72276
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pass full paths to make-bootstrap #72275
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bump vulnerable transitive dependencies #72272
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Merge pull request #72217 from CyrusNajmabadi/classificationPerf2" #72270
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Make shadow copy logic a bit smarter #72244
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix the log contention in correctness legs #72263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in lexer #72243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve behavior of SyntaxRemoveOptions.AddElasticMarker #72255
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE
  • Do not return unexisting kinds in `SyntaxFacts`' methods #72264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Convert Clasp into a source package #72237
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153
  • Patterns: Allow non-negative and full integer sets to merge (intersect or union) #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Params parameter is implicitly scoped if and only if `params` is explicitly specified in source. #72256
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Make Workspaces.MSBuild build with a netstandard target #72257
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Exporting services for specific workspace kinds #72236
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Remove solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fixed List pattern is not correctly formatted in the first arm of a switch expression #72269
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • GetRelative paths accepts paths shorter than the base directory #72166
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix asserts when emitting calls with optional byref parameters #72203
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid performing a defensive copy for enum parameters #72246
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations under SolutionCompilationState by using ImmutableSegmentedDictionary #72220

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EphemeralDataProtectionProvider isn't used by XmlKeyManager #54234
  • Regression: Blazor InteractiveAuto doesn't work in browser without WebAssembly support after update to .NET 8.0.2 #54233
  • Blazor SSR implementation of Fortunes benchmark is considerably slower than Razor Pages implementation #54232
  • [Blazor] Blazor WebAssembly perf benchmarks are failing #54230
    9.0-preview3
  • Perf improvement: updates #54229
  • Error connecting my client, .NET MAUI project, to my signalr server, ASP .NET project. #54228
  • SignalR's JSON protocol does not support polymorphic serialization on streaming methods #54227

Closed

  • ActivatorUtilities - matching preferred constructor depends on the constructors order #54235
  • Change nullability annotation of HostString.Value to explictly allow nulls #53567
  • Create 5-10 canonical scenarios encompassing "how to do cloud native .NET" and make them friction-free. #42189
    7.0.0
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #54206
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, connectionclosehttps, json #54184
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, updates #54213
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, mapaction #54217
  • Blazor web app (dotnet 8): data-enhance-nav="false" is not working when tag <a/> is wrapping some <svg/> #52205
    8.0.x
  • Convert all the internal static readonly string values on Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.IdentityConstants.cs to const #53442
  • Identity 8 doesnt work on PostgresSQL #53433
  • Add perf benchmarks for Blazor Web scenarios #51971
    9.0-preview2
  • Blazor WebAssembly doesn't compile after upgrade to 8.0.2, then shows blank page #54219
  • Blazor WebApp Wasm HttpClient Error Even on Prerendered False #53355

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Fix WASM perf benchmarks #54231
    area-blazor, area-perf
  • Preserve RemoteAuthenticationContext during JS interop #54225
    area-blazor
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.3.24126.2 #54221
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Change nullability annotation of HostString.Value to explictly allow null #53568
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b75ecf1` to `9d43b27` #54190
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove dead property from SourceBuild.props #54222
    area-infrastructure
  • Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54188
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update TestRazorCompiledItem.cs #54211
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Avoid call to ASCII.GetBytes during HostFilteringMiddleware static initialization #52978
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-dsrouter and dotnet-gcdump doc needed when default port is occupied #4524

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add SOS !printexception usage details #4527

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CarouselView - The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first #20852
  • PointerGestureRecognizer Does Not Work on Android #20849
  • Android Plattform related Errors CS0246 'MauiAppCompatActivity' & 'MauiApplication' #20847
  • AbsoluteLayout initialized in code-behind does not update view layout on Android #20845
    Backlog
  • CollectionView view DataTemplateSelector takes random layout when scroll on Windows #20842
    Backlog
  • FontFamily is not set on Editor Placeholder on iOS #20839
    Backlog
  • AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds bound to a StaticResource Rect gives InvalidCastException when XamlC enabled on Android #20838
    Backlog
  • Add FlexLayout XAML property "Gap" with the equivalent of a fixed css.gap between objects #20837
    Backlog
  • Button text color doesn’t change on pressed using Style iOS #20836
  • Clearing the cookies programmatically of WebAuthenticatoron on Android #20835
    Backlog

Closed

  • Color Gray is displayed in xaml editor but Grey isn't. #20827
  • No .NET MAUI App template founded in VS2022 #20832
  • Certain Errors occur in my Project. #20844
  • REST API interaction tutorial for MAUI shows antipatterns without warning #20829
  • Compiled Xaml Sometimes Ignores Errors in ContentPage.ToolbarItems #20735
    Backlog
  • GraphicsView EndInteraction Event dont show which Touchpoint has been ended/DragInteraction fires very late when Scale is big #20609
  • Getting 'Workload ID maui is not recognized' error when attempting to install .NET Maui #20659
  • nuget还原不了 #20673

PullRequests

Created

  • Document missing properties for ViewHandler #20853
  • Fix XAML intellisense and hot reload in Visual Studio 2022 #20851
  • Test increasing timeout for iOS device tests #20843
    do-not-merge

Merged

  • [net9.0] Revert runtime bumps #20848
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update layout.md #20825
    community ✨
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #20540
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [net9.0] [ci] Remove ForceNet8Current #20716
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • added Command and CommandParameter on CheckBox #20717
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-checkbox
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #20708
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦
  • [Trimming] Fix event trigger trimming warnings #20810
  • [Trimming] Use typed bindings internally #20567
    area/Xaml </>
  • [XC] Compile bindings with Source #20610
    area/Xaml </>
  • Ignore ScrollRectToVisible if KeyboardAutoManagerScroll is enabled in ItemsViewController #19875
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [iOS] CharacterEncoding should be used instead of NSStringEncoding. #20398
    do-not-merge, megapipeline/main
  • Android Google Maps bump #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-refreshview
  • [XamlC] Prioritize compiled markup extensions over primitive types #20808
  • Propagate the app theme to all children #19931
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Call RootViewChanged when setting ContentView to null #20052
    area/shell 🐢
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error nuget installation from local packages #33165
  • A query with complex properties returns data from a wrong table #33161
  • Holistic end-to-end pagination feature #33160
  • Entity Framework results in timeout errors, particularly when using OrderBy in conjunction with Take #33158
  • When using a IMaterializationInterceptor, no methods in it is called #33157

Closed

  • Error while running build script #33155
  • ExecuteDelete fails on entity configured to use table splitting #33121
  • What is the proper way how to use a relational connection? #33162
  • Why create table twice? #33141
  • Which .slnf to use for development? #33156
  • Sqlite foreign key constraint violation exception does not include constraint name #33140

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 3.0.0-preview-0045-g9b6fc72764 to 3.0.0-preview-0049-g4f33c8d8b1 #33163

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

PullRequests

Created
